meanings.sent1: The bicycle with hubless wheels looked unique.
meanings.sent2: The hubless design of the wheel made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The hubless wheel seemed like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: Her hubless approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The hubless wheel spun freely, like a leaf in the wind.

meanings.definition: Without a central point or focus
meanings.sent3: The hubless meeting felt like a comedy sketch.
meanings.sent4: Her hubless thoughts drifted like clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The hubless plot of the movie left the audience confused.
